info.name: Toorhop
info.description:
### Welcome to Toorhop Payment Microservice!
Toorhop Payment Microservice is a RESTful Web Service served as a communication bridge between Main Toorhop API and third party payment method services.
### Middleware & Authenticator
This microservice is guard with two middlewares, Jwt and one time client token.
#### Jwt Authenticator
[Jwt](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSON_Web_Token "Jwt") is used to guard the *Managing endpoints* (will be described at Endpoints section).
Http Request Header for the JWT middleware:

| Header   | Value   | Definition   |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------ |
| Content-Type  | application/json  | 	The Content-Type field indicates that JSON type is acceptable to send to the recipient	  |
| Accept   | application/json  | The Accept field is used to specify that JSON type is acceptable for the response  |
| Authorization  | Bearer {token}  | Jwt token generated when login using email and password  |
 

#### One Time Client Token Authenticator
Client Token is used to guard the *payment method enpoints* (will be described at Endpoints section).

| Header   | Value   | Definition   |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------ |
| Content-Type  | application/json  | 	The Content-Type field indicates that JSON type is acceptable to send to the recipient	  |
| Accept   | application/json  | The Accept field is used to specify that JSON type is acceptable for the response  |
| x-toorhop-date   | 1552555xxx  | unix timestamp  |
| x-toorhop-key   | LFgxxxxxxxxx | Client key generated/given by Toorhop Payment Micro Service  |
| x-toorhop-token   |eyJhbGciOixxxxxxx  | Json Web token for authorization  |
 

**Description**:
x-toorhop-date: `moment().unix()` (generated with [MomentJs](https://momentjs.com/ "MomentJs") package)
x-toorhop-key: `client_key` (generated/given by Toorhop Payment Microservice)
x-toorhop-token: generated using [jsonwebtoken](https://www.npmjs.com/package/jsonwebtoken "jsonwebtoken") package.
```javascript
    const token = await jwt.sign(
          {
            exp: Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000) + EXPIRY_IN_MINUTES * 60,
            data: {
              date,
              client_key: TOORHOP_CLIENT_KEY
            }
          },
          TOORHOP_CLIENT_SECRET
        )
```
 
## API Base URL
Development Environment : https://midtrans.toorhop.com/api/dev-v1
Production Environment : https://midtrans.toorhop.com/api/v1
Documentation: https://midtrans.toorhop.com/docs

## Endpoints

item.name: Users
item.description: Managing endpoint for CRUD operations to generate Users with Administrator (role_id = 1) role and clients (role_id = 2) role. Access with JWT authentication.

item.name: Client Token
item.description: To generate One Time Client Token, can only be accessed in development environment

item.name: Midtrans Payment Type

response.name: List
Show

item.description: Managing endpoint of CRUD operation of Available Midtrans Payment type.

item.name: Midtrans Payment Instruction

response.name: List
Store
Show
Update

item.description: Managing Enpoint for CRUD operation for Midtrans Payment Instructions. Every midtrans payment method has relationship of one to many with the Midtrans payment instructions to be shown to users how to do the payment using the choosen payment method.
